item.title: Identifying potentially related records - How does the GBIF data-clustering feature work?
item.description: NOTE: The content of this blog post is now maintained in the technical documentation. Please view this source for the most up to date information on the topic. Many data users may suspect theyâ€™ve discovered duplicated records in the GBIF index. You download data from GBIF, analyze them and realize that some records have the same date, scientific name, catalogue number and location but come from two different publishers or have slightly different attributes.
